Class.Name: TimerNodeable
Class.Description: While active, will signal the output at the given interval.

Output.Name: On Tick
Output.Description: Signaled at each tick while the timer is in operation.

Parameter.Name: Milliseconds
Parameter.Description: The amount of time that has elapsed since the timer started in milliseconds.

Parameter.Name: Seconds
Parameter.Description: The amount of time that has elapsed since the timer started in seconds.
